document.full_text: a palestinian official close to u.n.- and egyptian-mediated negotiations told reuters on sunday that israel and militant groups in gaza had agreed a truce, as cross-border violence abated.
document.title: israel and hamas look to end gaza flare-up
lines_and_colors: a palestinian official close to u.n.- and egyptian-mediated negotiations told reuters on sunday that israel and militant groups in gaza had agreed a truce, as cross-border violence abated.
